titleStmt.title: The dying man's last legacy, or, Pious and affectionate exhortations to a holy life as it was left by a dying man to his wife, children, and servants, for their improvement after his death, and for the advantage of every true Christian.
titleStmt.author: F. G.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
